Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Establishes safety requirements for commercial bicycle operators and businesses
Summary: Establishes safety requirements for operators who use bicycles with electric assist for commercial purposes and the businesses that employ such operators.
LawCode: Add ยง1244, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing safety requirements for commercial bicycle operators and businesses
